card.name: Aeromunculus
card.text: Flying {2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

card.name: Bedevil
card.text: Destroy target artifact, creature, or planeswalker.

card.name: Gate Colossus
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control. Gate Colossus can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever a Gate enters the battlefield under your control, you may put Gate Colossus from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Growth Spiral
card.text: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Imperious Oligarch
card.text: Vigilance Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Lavinia, Azorius Renegade
card.text: Each opponent can't cast noncreature spells with converted mana cost greater than the number of lands that player controls. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if no mana was spent to cast it, counter that spell.

card.name: Light Up the Stage
card.text: Spectacle {R} Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Rafter Demon
card.text: Spectacle {3}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Rafter Demon enters the battlefield, if its spectacle cost was paid, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Rakdos Firewheeler
card.text: When Rakdos Firewheeler enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Rix Maadi Reveler
card.text: Spectacle {2}{B}{R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.) When Rix Maadi Reveler enters the battlefield, discard a card, then draw a card. If Rix Maadi Reveler's spectacle cost was paid, instead discard your hand, then draw three cards.

card.name: Simic Ascendancy
card.text: {1}{G}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a creature you control, put that many growth counters on Simic Ascendancy. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Simic Ascendancy has twenty or more growth counters on it, you win the game.

card.name: The Haunt of Hightower
card.text: Flying, lifelink Whenever The Haunt of Hightower attacks, defending player discards a card. Whenever a card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, put a +1/+1 counter on The Haunt of Hightower.

card.name: Tithe Taker
card.text: During your turn, spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast and abilities your opponents activate cost {1} more to activate unless they're mana abilities. Afterlife 1 (When this creature dies, create a 1/1 white and black Spirit creature token with flying.)

card.name: Zegana, Utopian Speaker
card.text: When Zegana, Utopian Speaker enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with a +1/+1 counter on it, draw a card. {4}{G}{U}: Adapt 4. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.) Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.
